about_the_game:
"The Original Island" officially released its built-in lossless songs and background music. It contains 20 original, high-quality background BGMS for the game, as well as one theme song for the game. Play great music and embark on an unforgettable jungle exploration to find secrets hidden on the other side of the world.



Music is built into the built-in Music player G-Music, which is independently developed. It can not only be compatible with games, but also run independently from games. It is a reliable and excellent Music player. The music player comes with four different skins to choose from.
